thread.section_title: Toptal Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Toptal | toptal.com
thread.title: Stephen C. Nevin
thread.title_full: Toptal reviewed by Stephen C. Nevin

author: Stephen C. Nevin
title: Stephen C. Nevin
text: I recently engaged Toptal to provide an experienced financial analyst with modeling experience to review the financial model prepared by my startup business. This engagement was necessary to ensure the accuracy of the financial model and also the relevance of the model in anticipation of its review by VC firms considering investing into our business. I had several qualified analysts to choose from, and the one I chose completed the engagement on time and on budget. As a CEO building a new business, I consider Toptal to be a very good option to access part time and project oriented financial expertise in a cost effective manner.
